Entries.AcceptGift_(O)376: Oh, Penny's favorite flower! She'll love this.$h%revealtastePenny376
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)651: Penny will love this! Mind if I give it to her?$h%revealtastePenny651
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)218: Oh, Tom Kha soup! I used to pick some up for Penny when I was drivin' all over the country$h%revealtastePenny218
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)72: Oh, lordy, this is fancy! You sure you want to give this old lady a diamond?$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)244: Oh, a roots platter! Penny loves these. Ma would make it for Pappy so he'd have enough energy to work in the mines. We ate that a lot when Penny was young.%revealtastePenny244
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)164: Oh, a sandfish! Pappy used to take Penny out fishin'. They'd catch so many of these. Mind if I give this one to her?%revealtastePenny164
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)254: Oh, Ma loved melons. She used to bring us some from the diner, whenever she could....think that's why Penny loves them so much.
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)907: Oh, this curry could rival Gus's. Is this his recipe?$h
